fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
~ Pilfer (3-shot): Target a player. If they have a limited-use ability, you will remove one charge of it. If they have multiple, you will remove one at random.
~ Repurpose (1-shot): Target two players. You will Pilfer from one and use the Pilfered ability on the second. If the Pilfered ability targets more than one player, it will fail.
~ Destroy Stock (1-shot): Target a player. You will learn their role and may choose one ability (including an infinite-use ability) to remove from their ability list.
